last_episode_to_air.name: Pilot
last_episode_to_air.overview: Heather throws a party to celebrate the release of her autobiography "I Know What You Did Last Summer and That Is Why I Married You: The Heather Bradford Story."

name: The Real Housewives of Horror
overview: "The Real Housewives of Horror" is a mock reality show that follows the lives of women married to iconic horror slashers, reformed or otherwise; and like the women of Orange County and New Jersey before them, they capitalize on their marriages to make an entertaining television show. Crossing horror with comedy and blurring the line between reality and fiction, "The Real Housewives of Horror" takes a hatchet to popular horror tropes.
